name: Cargills Suwandel Rice
description: Suwandel rice has a special milky taste and is an ideal choice for festive occasions and ceremonies. Suwandel's nutrient composition consists of 69.7% carbohydrate, 7% protein, 2.8% fat and 5.4% fibre. Suwandel rice promotes healthy skin and hair, aids digestion and helps to control diabetes.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
